summary: Fight against tons of hard leveled monster! The best dungeon for heavy leveled players! Latest version of Skyrim required!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]
[center][img]http://s24.postimg.org/9t325tapx/copertina900.jpg[/img]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68270]* TRADUZIONE ITALIANA QUI *[/url]

* A VERY SPECIAL THANKS TO ShitagiDorobou WHO CORRECTED THE ENGLISH TRANSLATION OF JOURNAL ENTRIES *


GET READY!

This is my dungeon mod for Skyrim: THE SECRET OF DRAGONHEAD. Find out that secret by going through this epic dungeon.
Fight all "very hard" leveled NPCs, find treasures, walk into the darkness!
There is a little quest, it's activated by reading a book equipped by a dead imperial inside the dungeon.[/center]

BEFORE YOU INSTALL THIS MOD
Make a clean savegame before install this mod. My mod is tested and it should be safe and bugfree. However do a clean savegame before installation. You should be at least lvl 30 and it requires at least 1 hour to finish.

NEWS
* Fixed CTDs (special thanks to JustinOther from Bethesda Softworks Forums) *

INSTALLATION
Place files into data folder of Skyrim. Open the Skyrim menu launcher, select data file option and activate mannyDragonhead. Press Ok and run Skyrim. Enjoy!

UNINSTALLATION
Just remove the two files (mannyDragonhead.esp and mannyDragonhead.bsa) from data folder of Skyrim.

CONSIDERATION
This mod have unique light templates, unique light sources and unique imagespaces. So if you have other mod installed that modify light templates and imagespaces, they are no affecting this mod.

BUGS
Please contact me if you discover bugs or glitches, thank you.

IF YOU ARE SEEKING FOR ANOTHER DEADLY DUNGEON MOD TOO I'LL RECCOMEND THIS ONE:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16256]Hjakhtraevarr Tomb[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18772]The Temple of Black Rock[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21256]The Oblivion's Realms Serie - The Gate of Solitude[/url]

CREDITS
Thanks all users at the Bethesda Softworks Forum who helped me about scripting. Thanks to my A very special thanks to ShitagiDorobou who revisited and corrected english translation of journals entries!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142]This is the ENB settings used[/url]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]Join my Facebook Page![/url]
